articles.title: Texas death row prisoner Melissa Lucio granted stay of execution. What does this mean? - ABC News
articles.description: The Texas Court of Criminal Appeals has delayed the execution of Melissa Lucio, amid growing doubts about whether she fatally beat her 2-year-old daughter. The Mexican-American woman was set for lethal injection on April 27 for the death of her daughter, whic…
articles.content:
The Texas Court of Criminal Appeals has delayed the execution of Melissa Lucio amid growing doubts about whether she fatally beat her 2-year-old daughter.
